actions.text: On agreeing to the Hultgren amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 256 (Roll no. 309).

description: Amendment sought to reduce the Department of Energy, Energy Programs, Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Account by $30 million and increase the Science Administrative and Facility Account for National Laboratories by $15 million and to apply the savings to deficit reduction.
purpose: An amendment to reduce the Department of Energy, Energy Programs, Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Account by $30 million and increase the Science Administrative and Facility Account for National Laboratories by the same amount.
